Articles.Content:
(AN: a short fictional document meant to be a satire of semi declassified documents)

** Operation Domino Falling**

The following documents detail the flight of the T1G (That1Guy aerospace) Gaourami VI Domino (M) that took place 6-25-2012

Ship Specs.:

4 1500kg liquid rocket boosters

Capable of Munar flight

Carries 8 passengers

7th Shuttle bought from T1G

Capable of horizontal landing

Needs atmosphere to land

Flight Events:

-00:02:00:00 Passengers boarded the Domino

00:00:00:00 Lift-off

+00:00:00:17 Roll maneuver to heading 90o

+00:00:01:13 Tilt maneuver 1 completed

+00:00:02:45 Tilt maneuver 2 completed

+00:00:03:58 Tilt maneuver 3 completed

+00:00:04:50 Boosters jettisoned

+00:00:05:06 stable 100km orbit achieved, munar injection approved

+00:00:15:23 Transmunar burn initiated

+00:06:13:06 Munar SOI entered

+00:06:33:50 Stable 100km Munar orbit achieved

+00:06:45:00 Decent burn initiated

+00:07:34:07 Domino\'s guidance computer sends error 66

+00:07:34:42 Contact lost with Domino

Manifest:

Pilot Jacob 'the Fox' Kerman

Capt. Kyle J Kerman

Nav. Officer Melanie Kerman

Archibald Kerman

Gregory P Kerman

Alexi I Kerman

Herald Kerman

Quincy Kerman

Bruce W Kerman

Mike C Kerman

Ashley Kerman

Radio Transmission Log:

(Lost due to unexpected computer trouble)

Findings of the KSA:

The loss of the Domino was a large lapse in ship safety guidelines. The KSA should have flown test flights to assess the landing capabilities of the Domino on the Mun. Furthermore the addition ofpassengers to the system was a massive lapse in morals and safety. The official final position of the Domino on the Mun is unknown. The public cover story is that the Domino suffered a massive failure in LKO.

The findings of the KSA are to remain classified until such time as can safely be revealed without backlash to the agency.
